stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner must pay 1 credit or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine The Runner must pay 1 credit or trash 1 of their installed cards.
text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 1[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 1[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards.
title: Fairchild 1.0
